name: Heart Of Bark
description:
Deep in the Preolian Forest, Prince Percy awakenes to find his kingdom to be under a curse. It now falls to him to explore the forest and solve the challenges he faces, to break the curse and save the Kingdom of Steris!

Controls WASD / Arrow Keys
MoveSpaceInteractTabMapESCSettings Credits

This game was created as part of the https://itch.io/jam/godot-fire-charity-jam-1.
